about_the_game:
About the Game
In Corrupted Worlds, you are the last hope— as an advanced alien probe travel into a decaying solar system on the brink of exthinction. Navigate nightmarish biomechanical labyrinths, uncover the fate of a vanished Terran civilization, and outrun the relentless spread of the crimson sun. But you’re not alone: A fractured AI, the sole survivor of a failed mission, guides your journey. Together, you’ll decode alien artifacts, salvage uncorrupted DNA, and confront the horrors left by the Scourge

Key Features
🌑 Survival-Driven Exploration – Traverse hostile, ever-shifting environments where oxygen-like energy reserves deplete as the red sun expands. Adapt or perish.
🔍 Hybrid Puzzle-Action – Solve  riddles using alien tech while evading Scourge-corrupted creatures and environmental collapse.
🚀 Dynamic Movement & Upgrades – Pilot alien probe, hack biomechanical systems, and unlock abilities to navigate labyrinths
🧬 DNA Synthesis Mechanics – Collect genetic samples to evolve your probe, resist the Scourge’s influence, and revive fragments of lost life.
🌌 Fragmented Narrative – Piece together logs, holograms, and cryptic transmissions to uncover why humanity gambled—and failed—to outrun the sun.
